item.title: Build Your Own Blog with Hugo - Local Hosting
item.description: Hugo is a framework to build websites, and lots of templates are provided for various purposes. This blog is also built on Hugo with the Basic theme by @siegerts, and based on my experience, I’m introducing how to build a blog with Hugo on mac. For a really quick start, you can visit the official site. Install Hugo The Hugo website lists up a couple of ways to install Hugo on mac.

item.title: WHO I AM
item.description: I’m Yongsub Lim who is a co-founder & principal data scientist at MakinaRocks, an industrial AI startup to improve the productivity of industry by latest AI techniques. Currently, I’m interested in machine learning and advanced analytics specialized for data generated from manufacturing process, and its applications including predictive maintenance, product quality control, and process optimization. CAREER Founder & Principal Data Scientist MakinaRocks May 2018 - present Data Scientist Data Analytics CoE at SK Telecom Feb 2017 - May, 2018 Postdoctoral Researcher Computer Science and Engineering at Seoul National University Sep 2015 - Jun 2016 Doctor of Philosophy Computer Science from KAIST Feb 2011 - Aug 2015 LINKS Curriculum Vitae / LinkedIn / Google Scholar / DBLP / Publications

item.title: PUBLICATIONS
item.description: Minsoo Jung, Yongsub Lim, Sumin Lee, and U Kang FURL: Fixed-memory and Uncertainty Reducing Local Triangle Counting for Multigraph Streams Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery (DMKD), 2019 (to appear) [pdf] [bib] Yongsub Lim, Minsoo Jung, and U Kang Memory-efficient and accurate sampling for counting local triangles in graph streams: from simple to multigraphs ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery from Data (TKDD), 2018 [pdf] [bib] Andre S. Yoon, Taehoon Lee, Yongsub Lim, Deokwoo Jung, Philgyun Kang, Dongwon Kim, Keuntae Park, and Yongjin Choi
